name: The Last Rocket Pilot
description:
The Last Rocket Pilot

All of our hope is locked and loaded aboard the only working rocket ship left in our world. Now we need you to take the controls and pilot the ship safely through a campaign of treacherous obstacles to find the green safe harbors and secure the salvation of the universe!

SPACEBAR = thrust
A = rotate left
D = rotate right

Inspired by gamedev.tv team.

In-game sounds include Gyorgy Ligeti Requiem and freesound.org creations

See more at reedoco.io
